content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0) with coal fuel
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Electricity network connecting multiple entities (id=9158)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Operation
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Output inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates

### Coal Mining Operation
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Output chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Automation Science Pack Production Line
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Input inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine 1 at (8.5, 13.5)
- Output inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Connected belt groups for material transport

### Research Lab
- Lab with automation science pack input
- Currently researching logistics technology

ERROR TIPS

### Issues with Extracting Items
- Ensure target chest contains the requested items before attempting extraction
- Verify the chest position coordinates are correct when attempting to extract items

### Power System Issues
- Monitor coal levels in boiler and add fuel before it runs out
- Keep coal mining operation running to maintain steady fuel supply

### Production Line Issues
- Ensure consistent supply of both copper plates and iron gear wheels to assembling machine
- Monitor input chest inventory levels to prevent production stoppages

### Resource Management
- Maintain adequate coal supply for all burner entities (mining drills, inserters, boiler)
- Set up reliable copper plate production to prevent shortages in science pack production

### Entity Placement
- Verify entity positions and connections before attempting to insert or extract items
- Ensure proper alignment of belts and inserters for efficient material transport
